snippet: Documents of statements that Major Nidal Malik Hasan made in 2010 to a military panel provided the first account of the shooting in his own words.
abstract: Documents are released of statements that Major Nidal Malik Hasan made in 2010 to a military panel, providing his account of 2009 shooting rampage at Fort Hood Army base; Hasan describes in blunt and unapologetic terms how he carried out the attack, which left 13 people dead, and says he wished for death so that he would be a martyr.
lead_paragraph: Documents of statements that Major Nidal Malik Hasan made in 2010 to a military panel provided the first account of the shooting in his own words.

headline.main: Fort Hood Gunman Told Panel That Death Would Make Him a Martyr
